General.Name: Raptis Group Ltd
General.Description: Raptis Group Limited engages in the property investment, development, and management activities in Australia. It develops residential, commercial, and retail projects, as well as resorts. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is based in Surfers Paradise, Australia. Raptis Group Limited operates as a subsidiary of Hanslow Holdings Pty Limited.
